description: This file contains unit tests for the 'OptionalType' template class, verifying its behavior such as value assignment, comparison, and state checks using the Google Test framework.

classes.name: OptionalType
classes.description: A template class representing an optional value, supporting operations like assignment, comparison, clearing, and checking if a value is set.

methods.name: Clear
methods.description: Resets the OptionalType to an unset state.

methods.name: IsSet
methods.description: Checks whether the OptionalType currently holds a value.

methods.name: Value
methods.description: Returns the stored value; throws or asserts if unset.
